name: C++ Tech Demo
description: Inspired by the early DOOM games, I have developed a first-person player which can move around a small level environment using basic movement. I want to start the project off with simple interaction such as moving the player around the room then adapt this to have shooting basic objects in a room, if I can succeed at movement and shooting I will implement more features for the game! I have included a GUI to show camera FOV, Speed, frame rate with a graph and buttons to play Audio.
